name: Bukkit Maven Repos
body:
#What is this you ask?

This is a list of maven repos + dependency names for various libs/things used in bukkit plugin coding. More to be used as an index for me than for public use, but it'll probably be useful to someone. Just ctrl+f for the lib you need, I guess.

##Bukkit

http://bukkit.org/  
http://jd.bukkit.org/dev/apidocs/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>bukkit-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.bukkit.org/content/groups/public/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.bukkit</groupId>
  <artifactId>bukkit</artifactId>
  <scope>provided</scope>
  <version>RELEASE</version>
</dependency>
```

##CraftBukkit

http://bukkit.org/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>bukkit-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.bukkit.org/content/groups/public/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.bukkit</groupId>
  <artifactId>craftbukkit</artifactId>
  <scope>provided</scope>
  <version>RELEASE</version>
</dependency>
```

##Metrics

https://github.com/Hidendra/Plugin-Metrics/wiki/Usage

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>mcstats-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.mcstats.org/content/repositories/releases/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mcstats.bukkit</groupId>
  <artifactId>metrics</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
</dependency>
```

##Metrics-lite

https://github.com/Hidendra/Plugin-Metrics/wiki/Usage

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>mcstats-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.mcstats.org/content/repositories/releases/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mcstats.bukkit</groupId>
  <artifactId>metrics-lite</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
</dependency>
```

##Gravity's updater

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/updater-2-1-easy-safe-and-policy-compliant-auto-updating-for-your-plugins-new.96681/page-9#post-2158575

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>gravity-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.gravitydevelopment.net</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>net.gravitydevelopment.updater</groupId>
  <artifactId>updater</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
</dependency>
```

##VaultAPI

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/vault/  
http://milkbowl.github.io/VaultAPI/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>vault-repo</id>
  <url>http://nexus.theyeticave.net/content/repositories/pub_releases</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>net.milkbowl.vault</groupId>
  <artifactId>VaultAPI</artifactId>
  <scope>provided</scope>
  <version>RELEASE</version>
</dependency>
```

##WorldEdit

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/worldedit/  
http://docs.sk89q.com/worldedit/apidocs/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>sk89q-repo</id>
  <url>http://maven.sk89q.com/repo/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.sk89q</groupId>
  <artifactId>worldedit</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
  <type>jar</type>
</dependency>
```

##WorldGuard

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/worldguard/  
http://docs.sk89q.com/worldguard/apidocs/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>sk89q-repo</id>
  <url>http://maven.sk89q.com/repo/</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.sk89q</groupId>
  <artifactId>worldguard</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
  <type>jar</type>
</dependency>
```

##ProtocolLib

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/protocollib/  
http://aadnk.github.io/ProtocolLib/Javadoc/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>comphenix-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.comphenix.net/content/groups/public</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.comphenix.protocol</groupId>
  <artifactId>ProtocolLib</artifactId>
  <scope>provided</scope>
  <version>LATEST</version>
</dependency>
```

##TapAPI

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/tagapi-change-color-the-name-over-peoples-heads.99485/  
http://kittehorg.github.io/TagAPI/apidocs/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>kitteh-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.kitteh.org/content/groups/public</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.kitteh</groupId>
    <artifactId>tagapi</artifactId>
    <scope>provided</scope>
    <version>3.0</version>
</dependency>
```

##Essentials

someone find me a link to general api info for this pls

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>ess-repo</id>
  <url>http://repo.ess3.net/content/groups/essentials</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>net.ess3</groupId>
  <artifactId>Essentials</artifactId>
  <scope>provided</scope>
  <version>RELEASE</version>
</dependency>
```

##Citizens

https://forums.bukkit.org/threads/lib-citizensapi-create-npcs-quickly-and-easily-mc-1-7-x.127674/  
http://jd.citizensnpcs.co/

``` xml
<repository>
  <id>everything</id>
  <url>http://repo.citizensnpcs.co</url>
</repository>
```

``` xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>net.citizensnpcs</groupId>
  <artifactId>citizensapi</artifactId>
  <version>LATEST</version>
  <scope>provided</scope>
</dependency>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
